title: Route level CORS config overrides connection level defaults
author: Eran Hammer
overview: When server level, connection level or route level CORS configurations are combined and when a higher level config included security restrictions (like origin), a higher level config that included security restrictions (like origin) would have those restrictions overridden by less restrictive defaults (e.g. origin defaults to all origins `*`).
recommendation: You should install hapi v11.1.4 or newer if you combine server level, connection level, or route level CORS configuration.
